scripts.build:ios:sim: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios-sim --debug && mkdir -p gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a
scripts.build:ios:device: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios && mkdir -p gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release/libapp.a
scripts.xcode: mkdir -p src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release && cp src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a 2>/dev/null || true && cp src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release/libapp.a 2>/dev/null || true && open src-tauri/gen/apple/peek-save.xcodeproj
scripts.dev:ios:quick: mkdir -p src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug && cp src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a && open src-tauri/gen/apple/peek-save.xcodeproj && npx vite --port 1420
scripts.clean:rust: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/build/peek-save-* target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'Rust bridge cache cleaned'
scripts.clean:ios:sim: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'iOS simulator cache cleaned'
scripts.clean:ios:device: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'iOS device cache cleaned'
scripts.rebuild:ios:sim: npm run clean:ios:sim && npm run build:ios:sim
scripts.rebuild:ios:device: npm run clean:ios:device && npm run build:ios:device
